member.summary: Creates an exact copy of the SuperTipSettings instance
member.returns: The copied SuperTipSettings

member.name: P:Janus.Windows.Common.SuperTipSettings.Text
member.summary: Get or sets the text to display as tool tip for a control.

member.name: P:Janus.Windows.Common.SuperTipSettings.ImageListProvider
member.summary: Gets or sets the objects that contains the ImageList from which the tool tip gets its images.

member.name: P:Janus.Windows.Common.SuperTipSettings.WordWrap
member.summary:
Gets or sets a value that determines whether Text in a tooltip should be wrapped to the begining of the next line when necessary.
This option applies only when a tooltip has no header nor footer specified. If a header or a footer is specified, the text will be wrapped when necessary.

member.name: P:Janus.Windows.Common.SuperTipSettings.HeaderText
member.summary: Get or sets the text to display as the header in a tool tip associated to a control.

member.name: P:Janus.Windows.Common.SuperTipSettings.FooterText
member.summary: Get or sets the text to display as the footer in a tool tip associated to a control.

member.name: P:Janus.Windows.Common.SuperTipSettings.IsEmpty
member.summary: Gets a value that determines whether a SuperTipSettings contains data or is empty and should not be displayed.

member.name: P:Janus.Windows.Common.SuperTipSettings.ToolTipStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets a value specifying the visual style of a tool tip.

member.name: P:Janus.Windows.Common.SuperTipSettings.Image
member.summary: Get or sets the Image to display in a tool tip associated to a control.

member.name: P:Janus.Windows.Common.SuperTipSettings.ImageIndex
member.summary: Gets or sets the image list index value of the image displayed in a tool tip.

member.name: P:Janus.Windows.Common.SuperTipSettings.ImageKey
member.summary: Gets or sets the key of the image displayed in a tool tip.

member.name: P:Janus.Windows.Common.SuperTipSettings.HeaderImage
member.summary: Gets or sets the Image displayed in the header of a tool tip.

member.name: P:Janus.Windows.Common.SuperTipSettings.FooterImage
member.summary: Gets or sets the Image displayed in the footer of a tool tip.

member.summary: Gets or sets the image list index value of the image displayed in the footer of a tool tip.

member.summary: Gets or sets the key of the image displayed in the footer of a tool tip.

member.summary: Gets or sets the image list index value of the image displayed in the header of a tool tip.

member.name: P:Janus.Windows.Common.SuperTipSettings.HeaderImageKey
member.summary: Gets or sets the key of the image displayed in the header of a tool tip.

member.summary: Creates a new instance of Janus.Windows.Common.VisualStyleManager class.

member.name: M:Janus.Windows.Common.VisualStyleManager.#ctor(System.ComponentModel.IContainer)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of Janus.Windows.Common.VisualStyleManager class.

member.name: M:Janus.Windows.Common.VisualStyleManager.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Clean up any resources being used.
member.param: true if managed resources should be disposed; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Janus.Windows.Common.VisualStyleManager.AddControl(System.Windows.Forms.Control,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Associates a control and its children controls (optional), to the VisualStyleManager.
member.param: The control to associate with the VisualStyleManager.
Determines whether the child controls should also be associated to the VisualStyleManager.

member.name: M:Janus.Windows.Common.VisualStyleManager.AddControl(System.Windows.Forms.Control,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Associates a control and its children controls (optional), to the VisualStyleManager with the colorScheme specified.
member.param: The control to associate with the VisualStyleManager.
The name of the ColorScheme to use in the control.
Determines whether the child controls should also be associated to the VisualStyleManager.

member.name: M:Janus.Windows.Common.VisualStyleManager.OnColorSchemeChanged(Janus.Windows.Common.ColorSchemeChangedEventArgs)
member.summary: Raises the ColorSchemeChanged event.

member.name: P:Janus.Windows.Common.VisualStyleManager.DefaultUseCompatibleTextRendering
member.summary: This property supports Janus controls behavior. Do not use.

member.name: P:Janus.Windows.Common.VisualStyleManager.ColorSchemes
member.summary: Gets the collection of JanusColorSchemes defined in the VisualStyleManager.

member.name: P:Janus.Windows.Common.VisualStyleManager.DefaultColorScheme
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the ColorScheme in the ColorSchemes collection to be used in a control with no ColorScheme specified.

member.name: E:Janus.Windows.Common.VisualStyleManager.ColorSchemeChanged
member.summary: Occurs when a property in a JanusColorScheme handled by the VisualStyleManager changes.

member.name: P:Janus.Windows.Common.VisualStyleManager.DefaultOffice2007ColorScheme
member.summary: Deprecated property. Use DefaultOfficeColorScheme property instead.

member.name: P:Janus.Windows.Common.VisualStyleManager.DefaultOfficeColorScheme
member.summary: Gets or set the OfficeColorScheme to be used in controls with OfficeColorScheme property set to Default. This static property allows you to change the OfficeColorScheme of all janus controls in an application with just one line of code. Assumming that the OfficeColorScheme is set to Default in all controls and the VisualStyle property is set to VisualStyle.Office2007 or VisualStyle.Office2010

member.name: P:Janus.Windows.Common.VisualStyleManager.DefaultOffice2007CustomColor
member.summary: Deprecated. Use DefaultOfficeCustomColor property instead.

member.name: P:Janus.Windows.Common.VisualStyleManager.DefaultOfficeCustomColor
member.summary: Gets or set the Color to be used in controls with Office2007CustomColor property set to Color.Empty. This static property allows you to change the OfficeCustomColor property of all janus controls in an application with just one line of code. Assumming that the OfficeCustomColor is set to Color.Empty in all controls and the VisualStyle property is set to VisualStyle.Office2007 or VisualStyle.Office2010

member.name: E:Janus.Windows.Common.VisualStyleManager.Office2007DefaultChanged
member.summary: Deprecated. Use OfficeDefaultStyleChanged event instead.

member.name: E:Janus.Windows.Common.VisualStyleManager.OfficeDefaultStyleChanged
member.summary: Occurs when DefaultOffice2007ColorScheme or DefaultOffice2007CustomColor properties changed in the VisualStyleManager class.

member.name: T:Janus.Windows.Common.ColorSchemeChangedEventHandler
member.summary: Represents the method that handles the ColorSchemeChanged event.

member.name: T:Janus.Windows.Common.ColorSchemeChangedEventArgs
member.summary: Contains the data for the ColorSchemeChanged event.

member.name: P:Janus.Windows.Common.ColorSchemeChangedEventArgs.ColorScheme
member.summary: Get the JanusColorScheme that changed.
